author: admin
title: NY declares state of emergency as East Coast schools close ahead of Winter Storm Stella
text:
NY declares state of emergency as East Coast schools close ahead of... NY declares state of emergency as East Coast schools close ahead of Winter Storm Stella By 0 36 
School and work, along with flights and plans, will be canceled, as cities across the Northeast brace for at least one more snowstorm this winter season. And it may be the most powerful yet, with a state of emergency announced in New York.
